project: Practical applications of IIIF as a building block towards a digital National Collection

int.title: Administration
stages: Project on hold due to Covid-19
Establish communications, collaborative environments and links with related interest groups
Establish connections with related AHRC projects – PIDs, Linked data, etc
Identify areas of collaboration with related AHRC projects.

ws.title: Workshops
stages: Workshop 1 - Showcase and discuss the current IIIF use and best practice
Workshop 2 - Discuss the potential of shared IIIF services
Organise Workshop 3 – Document available resources and development ideas

cr.title: Collaborative Research
stages: Define scope and selection of main IIIF demonstration/examples
Development work of main IIIF demonstration/examples
Explore available and potential future IIIF services and tools
Write recommendations for required IIIF services and related future proposals
Evaluate selection of identified IIIF Resources
Refresh IIIF Resource List for Workshop 3

pl.title: Placements
stages: Secondments (some may be virtual) for researcher
